title: http_audit
label: Http Audit
description: Records and monitors HTTP session activities, including requests, responses, and headers for security auditing purposes.

requestHeader.example:
Host: webserver01.corp.example.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.7
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.9
Connection: keep-alive
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
Referer: https://intranet.corp.example.com/
Cookie: sessionId=ABC123DEF456; csrfToken=xyz789abc

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/118.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

responseHeader.example:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 26 Oct 2023 14:32:48 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.56 (Debian)
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 1256
Connection: keep-alive
Set-Cookie: sessionId=ABC123DEF456; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains

name.example: HTTP Session Audit: GET request to /index.php on webserver01.corp.example.com

srcGeoAddress.example: 123 Main Street, San Francisco, California, United States, 94105

destGeoAddress.example: 123 Main Street, San Jose, California, United States, 95112
